q: and confounded the Grizzlies with his quickness. The 76ers never trailed over the last three quarters but played fast and loose with the lead until Allen Iverson took charge in the fourth quarter, when he scored 11 points. Allen Iverson got it going and http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_32pts_12asts_clutch_FT_vs_Grizzlies_NBA_07/08 Trailing by seven points with 3:12 left, the Denver Nuggets didn't panic. They made veteran plays. The Memphis Grizzlies were hurt by their youth. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102.`` This was a Yao Ming win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. I Roy think a game like this is going to help us down the road.'' Elias Says Allen Iverson

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
